name: Monster Camp (Demo)
description:
You are not the hero.

You are group of weak monsters, but with your combined strengths, you just might be able to defeat the hero! Defend your camp from the invading hero, and whatever you do...

DON'T GET WIPED OUT!

Strength in numbers.

Switch between monsters with unique abilities and strengths.

String combos together to unlock skull chests in each level!

Play with interactable objects like carts and explosive barrels for extra-crazy gameplay!

Simple controls.

Move    ->  Arrow Keys, WASD

Attack  ->  Space Bar, Left Mouse Button

Switch  ->  C, Right Mouse Button

Mobile controls are available! Tap the rectangle icon above the settings on the home screen.

Tips and tricks.
  • The hero will target the monster that hit them, so you can distract them!
  • Monsters attacks recover faster when they're not being controlled.
  • Increase your combo points by hitting hard, fast, and with objects!
  • When the hero is stunned, you can hit them with any attack to stun them again!
  • You can deflect the hero's boomerang with any attack.

Watch the devlogs documenting Monster Camp's progress!
